title: MOMO: New Ferrari, New Series
description:
MOMO driver Henrique Cisneros explains the challenges the team has faced in its first season in the Pirelli World Challenge series with their new Ferrari 458. 

Watch the amazing on board footage, and see what happens when the rain showed up. 


MOMO Italy presents a new series of shorts on /DRIVE, featuring high frame rate slow motion footage from Pirelli World Challenge race weekends, all season.
tags: Ferrari 458, Pirelli World Challenge, motorsport, MOMO, racing
